banner.title: AI Infrastructure for Global Transaction Transparency
banner.description: Powered by Google Gemini technology and integrated with banks and crypto platforms worldwide, our system provides real-time visibility into fund movements, risk scoring, and automated compliance actions.

about.title: Understanding the Platform
about.paragraph1: The system combines large-scale financial data modeling, behavioral analytics, and regulatory intelligence to interpret the flow of money across connected accounts and digital assets.
about.paragraph2: It operates as a neutral analytical layer — securely connected to financial institutions through verified APIs, providing structured insight into every transaction chain and its associated risk.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.text: Direct API integrations with regulated banks and major crypto exchanges.

intelligence.title: Intelligence
intelligence.text: Gemini-based models optimized for real-time financial reasoning.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: Fully compliant with GDPR, AMLD6, and open-banking frameworks.

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.text: Processes multi-channel financial data and identifies irregular activity using Gemini's contextual understanding.

risk.title: Risk Evaluation
risk.text: Applies AI-driven scoring and behavioral clustering to determine exposure to fraud, unauthorized use, or compliance breach.

response.title: Automated Response
response.text: When risk thresholds are reached, the system can initiate authorized procedures — including chargeback, recall, or dispute actions — directly through institutional APIs.

benefit.title: Access and Regulatory Framework
benefit.item1: Because the platform interacts with live financial networks, access is granted only after completion of a short compliance onboarding required by global regulators.
benefit.item2: This ensures lawful data exchange, verified identity, and full accountability of every operation executed through the AI infrastructure.
benefit.footer: Compliance is not an add-on — it's an integral part of the system design.

transparency.title: Designed for Transparency, Built for Trust
transparency.text1: The platform helps institutions and individuals detect irregular financial behavior, reduce exposure to fraud, and maintain full visibility over both fiat and digital transactions.
transparency.text2: It functions as a permanent monitoring layer that ensures each movement of value is traceable, explainable, and compliant.
transparency.box1: Real-time transaction interpretation across financial networks
transparency.box2: Automated compliance checks and incident reporting
transparency.box4: Structured traceability for regulators and users alike

hero.title: Gemini-Powered Financial Intelligence Architecture
hero.description: The system is powered by Google Gemini's multimodal AI framework — an infrastructure capable of analyzing structured and unstructured financial data at scale. Combined with proprietary risk and compliance logic, it enables continuous monitoring, contextual reasoning, and secure interaction with financial institutions and blockchain ecosystems.
hero.summary: At its core, the platform transforms complex transaction data into transparent, regulator-ready insights.

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.description: The technology stack is organized into five interconnected layers, each dedicated to a specific stage of financial data processing — from secure ingestion to regulatory action.

data.title: Data Sources
data.text: Read-only access to banks, payment processors, and crypto exchanges via verified APIs. Supports Open Banking, ISO 20022, and blockchain data streams.

gemini.title: Gemini AI Core
gemini.text: Processes high-volume financial data using Gemini's multimodal reasoning capabilities. Performs natural-language interpretation of metadata, behavioral clustering, and entity correlation across accounts.

risk.title: Risk Engine
risk.text: Executes machine learning–based scoring logic that identifies anomalies, duplicate transfers, hidden subscriptions, and unauthorized activity. Each chain of transactions receives a dynamic risk profile updated in real time.

compliance.title: Compliance Layer
compliance.text: Implements AML, KYC, GDPR, and regional data-protection standards. Ensures traceability and accountability of every decision generated by the AI. Provides audit logs compatible with regulatory review formats.

response.title: Response API Gateway
response.text: Acts as a secure communication channel between the platform and financial institutions. Authorized by compliance rules, it can initiate chargeback, recall, or dispute procedures when confirmed irregularities are detected.

secureData.title: Secure Data Handling
secureData.description:
All connected data flows operate in read-only mode.
The platform does not execute or store financial operations; it only interprets and reports them.

accordion.title: Security measures:
accordion.text:
• TLS 1.3 and AES-256 end-to-end encryption
• Differential privacy in all data aggregation processes
• Region-based data segregation (EU / NA / APAC)
• Immutable audit trail stored in compliance-ready format

geminiRisk.title: Gemini Cognitive Risk Engine
geminiRisk.description: Using Gemini's reasoning capabilities, the platform interprets financial behavior not only through numerical anomalies, but also through semantic patterns — e.g. metadata, transaction descriptions, and behavioral correlations.

accordion.title: Capabilities:
accordion.text:
• Continuous anomaly detection across fiat and crypto ecosystems
• Behavior-based fraud scoring (0–100 scale)
• Contextual understanding of transaction purpose and counterpart behavior
• Adaptive learning: the model evolves as transaction networks change

intelligentAction.title: Intelligent Action Framework
intelligentAction.description: When the AI identifies high-risk financial behavior, it prepares a structured incident report and — within the regulatory boundaries — triggers automated responses through partner APIs:

accordion.title: All actions are logged, timestamped, and approved within the compliance layer before execution.
accordion.text:
• Bank chargeback / recall requests for suspicious transfers
• Exchange dispute / refund submissions for fraudulent digital-asset activity
• Regulatory incident report generated for audit and supervision

explainable.title: Explainable and Auditable AI
explainable.description: Every output produced by the Gemini-based core includes explainability metadata: which variables influenced a decision, why the model classified an action as risky, and what regulatory framework the response aligns with.

accordion.title: Features:
accordion.text:
• Transparent model decisions for auditors and regulators
• Traceable reasoning chain for each incident
• Configurable sensitivity thresholds per user or institution

standards.title: Aligned with Global Standards
standards.description: The system adheres to the highest standards of security and financial data governance. All operations follow the principles of open banking, data minimalism, and regulator supervision.

accordion.title: Compliance frameworks:
accordion.text:
• GDPR (Europe)
• AMLD6 (EU directive)
• ISO 27001 (Information Security)
• SOC 2 (Data integrity and privacy)
• PCI DSS (Financial data protection)

hero.title: Applications Across the Financial Ecosystem
hero.description:
The platform's modular architecture allows it to operate across multiple layers of the financial landscape — from individual account monitoring to institutional compliance infrastructure.
Built on Gemini's AI framework, it interprets transaction data, evaluates behavioral risk, and acts through verified financial APIs.
hero.summary: Different users. One system of transparency.

personal.title: Personal Financial Awareness and Protection
personal.description: For individual users, the system functions as a continuous monitoring environment that provides real-time visibility into every transaction. It identifies recurring charges, hidden subscriptions, and potential unauthorized activity—and, when required, initiates authorized refund or dispute requests through the user’s financial institution.

accordion.title: Use cases:
accordion.text:
• Detect recurring or duplicate payments
• Identify unauthorized transactions before they accumulate
• Receive structured reports with fraud scores and compliance context
• Automate chargeback or recall processes securely

personal.note: Individuals gain clarity over their digital finances and reduce losses from unnoticed activity or subscription leakage.

corporate.title: Corporate Transaction Oversight
corporate.description: For enterprises, the platform acts as a financial integrity layer—monitoring all outgoing and incoming transactions to ensure they align with internal policies, vendor agreements, and regional compliance standards.

accordion.title: Use cases:
accordion.text:
• Detect unapproved or duplicate vendor payments
• Analyze financial exposure across accounts and subsidiaries
• Generate automated compliance and audit reports
• Identify early indicators of account misuse or insider fraud

corporate.note: Financial institutions gain a scalable, regulator-aligned AI layer for fraud management and customer protection.

infrastructure.title: AI-Powered Fraud and Compliance Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Banks, fintech companies, and exchanges integrate the system through API to enhance their fraud detection, transaction traceability, and regulatory response capabilities. The Gemini-based core delivers contextual risk assessment for both fiat and crypto operations, improving precision and reducing false positives.

accordion.title: Use cases:
accordion.text:
• Real-time anomaly detection across payment networks
• Automated escalation of high-risk transaction chains
• Instant generation of incident reports for compliance teams
• Support for chargeback and dispute automation through regulated APIs

infrastructure.note: Financial institutions gain a scalable, regulator-aligned AI layer for fraud management and customer protection.

regulatory.title: Transparent Oversight and Traceability
regulatory.description: For supervisory bodies and regulatory auditors, the platform provides a neutral AI-driven view of transaction networks—with explainable reasoning, immutable audit trails, and standardized data export formats.

accordion.title: Use cases:
accordion.text:
• Cross-platform tracing of suspicious fund movement
• Automated AML/KYC anomaly detection
• Centralized visualization of institution-wide financial flows
• On-demand audit data with full explainability metadata

regulatory.note: Regulators receive structured, verified, and explainable financial intelligence aligned with global compliance frameworks.

connectivity.title: Unified Ecosystem Connectivity
connectivity.description: Through open APIs, the system connects to financial, blockchain, and compliance infrastructures — enabling data exchange between individual, corporate, and institutional layers without compromising privacy or regulatory boundaries.

accordion.title: Integrations include:
accordion.text:
• Retail and commercial banks
• Payment gateways and acquirers
• Major crypto exchanges and custodians
• Compliance management systems
• Governmental AML & financial intelligence units

impact.title: Impact Across All Stakeholders
impact.description: By introducing explainable AI into the financial ecosystem, the platform improves visibility, reduces systemic fraud, and enhances compliance efficiency across all participants.

accordion.title: Shared benefits:
accordion.text:
• Unified fraud-risk framework across fiat and crypto ecosystems
• Automated compliance actions with regulator-approved logic
• Reduced operational costs for investigation and reporting
• Enhanced user trust through transparency and accountability
